results.content:
Fijn dat alles stap per stap wordt uitgelegd. Bij Adope Ps ging het soms wat snel. . Ik had gehoopt dat de gebruikte functies iets meer werden toegelicht of in ieder geval getoond werd waar te klikken/snel combi's.
Nu bij WP is de uitleg duidelijk. Het Xtheme wordt gebruikt, dat is een betaald thema. Zelf maak ik gebruik van Elementor. Ga het X theme zeker overwegen maar de kosten liggen hier wat hoger.

results.content: The presentation is clear and practical.  I love the constant tips, around the reasons for the color and font style usage.  I already know most of the websites, to obtain the resources, but the fact that Chris shares them with their links is extremely useful to those not in the know.  The professional layout of the website being designed makes the course even more exciting.  Usually, trainers course do a shoddy practical which adds no practical value to the student.  Awesome website and awesome course.  Thanx -Chris!

I already know most of the websites, to obtain the resources, but the fact that Chris shares them with their links is extremely useful to those not in the know. The professional layout of the website being designed makes the course even more exciting. Usually, trainers course do a shoddy practical which adds no practical value to the student. Awesome website and awesome course. Thanx -Chris!

results.content:
Until now is good, not above expectations but if the content is consistent across all the course I will gladly rate 5.
The full 1 hour video using photoshop is good, it makes me feel confortable following the steps, I prefer this version than a resumed version, in this case more is better than less. You could add a second tutorial with a different design and that will be above expectations for me.

results.content: This is a great first introduction to designing your own website using x-theme. I have no prior experience with Wordpress and Chris is explaining everything in simple terms so that the most challenging design aspects becomes something that you quickly get to master. The course content does not leave you with gaps not knowing what to do next.

results.content:
Chris is an awesome guy and you would not go wrong with this course. It started my journey into understanding WordPress and Google AdWords.

I recommend this course to anyone, especially beginners in web development. You will benefit greatly from it.

He's presentation is also awesome. One of the best presented courses I've seen on Udemy.

Get this course... You won't be disappointed... I wasn't
